name: Car Smash Zombie War
description:
Car Smash Zombie War is the most epic post-apocalyptic racing game where you have to battle zombies for survival.The goal is to kill and survive. Drive your way through zombie apocalyptic arena by killing zombies with your car. Upgrade your car with advance weapons and armor.
features:
• Excellent 3D graphics and real-time environment.
• Zombie killer racing cars.
• 3D maps for searching walking dead zombies.
• Latest special sniper warrior guns for zombie race shooting.
